<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dimensional Disappearance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2870) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 47 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[_dimensional assault_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1037) focus spell, [laughing shadow hybrid study](/HybridStudies.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

You take advantage of teleportation to better hide your position. When you cast [_dimensional assault_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1037), you're affected by an [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) spell at the end of the teleport. You can choose not to make the Strike that is normally part of _dimensional assault_. If you do make the Strike, your invisibility ends after the Strike, as normal for _invisibility_.
name: Dimensional Disappearance
prerequisite: _dimensional assault_ focus spell, laughing shadow hybrid study
